name: Force of Nature
description: Force of Nature is a Sandbox game that combines Action, Adventure, RPG, Strategy and Management genres
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb Video Memory, Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb Video Memory, Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
